title: in-Game Leavers
body:
Just wanna let you guys know about this stupid leaver named "Korean Toxic"..

Not sure wether it's just his name or he made that account just for being toxic n leave games

[IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/ux1th.jpg[/IMG]

It's in Gold V division and he just made me mad by failing my promo. Cheers!

replies.body:
Naming and shaming will just get you banned from the forums. If you're going to make a thread about something, black out ALL names (apart from your own if you wish) but even then there's little point.

LeaverBuster has been tightened up recently, you don't even need to make a thread/support ticket because he'll quickly get punished if he leaves more games. Since it's ranked I believe you get punished after a single leave, but I might be wrong there.

Send a support ticket if it annoyed you that much. Don't name and shame on the forums.
It also looks like that was the first game he has left in ages. A lot of people tonight are having firewall issues so it could be that.
